nodes.text: The Heavy turbolaser turret was the heaviest shipboard weapon installed aboard the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer.

These twin-barreled turbolasers were mounted alongside the flanks of Imperial I-class Star Destroyers, where they served as heavy anti-capital ship weapons. While they were too slow to reliably target fast starfighters, even a glancing hit of these weapons could destroy a small craft. Each of these turbolasers could overload deflector shields or penetrate the hulls of the most heavily armored spaceships.
